title: Raknik77

content: Hello i need peoples in nz,australia,uk,usa,caribbe.Btc and usdt i find escrow welcome or i can send in first small.@aleptc my tg u welcome happy trade

comments.author: homer25
comments.body: hello i am ready for trade. where r u based? we can liege. add me @happyhomer TG

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Is there no way to trade directly with exchange p2p?Most times it's very hard to trust newbies with trade getting an escrow doesn't guaranteed that trading is safe I have involved myself then with someone who wants to trade his coin to a particular currency asking to get escrow after I did he refused to further trade saying he will be one to provide the escrow from then I noticed there is something phishing out there and, that was how I declined the payment.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: It is better to write down the payment method, and if it is final and irreversible, it will be easy for you to find members here. However, if it is reversible, even escrow cannot help you, and here you must be reliable or deal P2P.BESTCHANGE gives you some options, so try it if there is what you are looking for.
